derivation: from H5182 (נְחַת); also (intransitively; perhaps from H5117 (נוּחַ))
outline:
1. rest, quietness
    1. quietness, quiet attitude
    2. rest (of death)
  2. descent (of judgment)
kjv_def: lighting down, quiet(-ness), to rest, be set on.
strongs_def: a descent, i.e. imposition, unfavorable (punishment) or favorable (food); restfulness
